name: AURORA
description: Meet the Aurora where exceptional value meets thoughtful design. With 2,077 square feet, 4 bedrooms, and 3 full bathrooms, this spacious model is one of the most affordable ways to step into a four-bedroom home without sacrificing quality. Enjoy a private master suite with its own bathroom, a guest bedroom with a dedicated bath, and two additional bedrooms served by a stylish guest bath. The open concept layout, high ceilings, and modern kitchen with custom cabinets and quartz countertops create a bright and welcoming space. The Aurora delivers premium living at a price that makes sense.
